root.name: Entropia Universe
root.description: Entropia Universe is notable for its real cash economy system. Players can deposit $1 for 10 PED (the in game currency) and withdraw PED for real money. The universe has had a number of notably high cost transactions including a $26,000 island, $100,000 space station, $330,000 space station, $400,000 worth of virtual banking licenses.
